schema.title: WellPressureTestRawMeasurement
schema.description: Entity aiming to capture raw measurements from Well Pressure Tests. It aims to capture single test file gathering raw measurements before any kind of processing, composing, interpretation or analysis

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

WellPressureTestAcquisitionJobID.title: Well Pressure Test Acquisition Job ID
WellPressureTestAcquisitionJobID.description: Identifier of the acquisition job master data.

WellPressureTestAcquisitionRunIdentifier.title: Well Pressure Test Acquisition Run Identifier
WellPressureTestAcquisitionRunIdentifier.description: Identifier of the Run within the acquisition job

AcquisitionStringToolFace.title: Acquisition String ToolFace
AcquisitionStringToolFace.description: Angle of rotation of the Acquisition String while running this test

PressureTestStartDate.title: Pressure Test Start Date
PressureTestStartDate.description: The date (and time) at which the test started

ClosedInDate.title: Closed In Date
ClosedInDate.description: Date that the production string has been closed in prior to the pressure test.

Measurements.title: Measurements
Measurements.description: Array of comprehensive description of the well test raw measurement (one entry per gauge's depth)

WellPressureTestAcquisitionStationIdenti.title: Well Pressure Test Acquisition Station Identifier
WellPressureTestAcquisitionStationIdenti.description: Identifier of the Station within the acquisition job captured in the unitary serie

PressurePointMeasuredDepth.title: Pressure Point Measured Depth
PressurePointMeasuredDepth.description: Measured Depth of the station for Stationary Tests - mutually exclusive with (PressureTestTop/bottom measuredDepth

PressureTestTopMeasuredDepth.title: Pressure Point Top Measured Depth
PressureTestTopMeasuredDepth.description: Measured Depth of the top station for Non Stationary Tests - mutually exclusive with (Pressure Point Measured Depth

PressureTestBottomMeasuredDepth.title: Pressure Point Bottom Measured Depth
PressureTestBottomMeasuredDepth.description: Measured Depth of the bottom station for Non Stationary Tests- mutually exclusive with (Pressure Point Measured Depth

TestNumber.title: Test Number
TestNumber.description: Sequential number of the test (or pre-test) which identifies it into the record

ActiveProbeTypeID.title: Pressure Test Probe Type Identifier
ActiveProbeTypeID.description: Describe the active Probe type for this current measurement station

ActiveGaugeID.title: Active Gauge Identifier
ActiveGaugeID.description: Identifier of the unitary gauge active for this specific curve measurement

PreTests.title: Pre Tests
PreTests.description: array of information to identify pretests measurements within the complete measurement recording.

items.title: PreTest
items.description: Describes the pieces of information required to identity individual pretests within the complete record.

PreTestNumber.title: Pre Test Number
PreTestNumber.description: Sequential number identifying the pretest within the record

PreTestStartTime.title: Pre Test Start Time
PreTestStartTime.description: Time index where the individual pretest starts into the sequence

PreTestEndTime.title: Pre Test End Time
PreTestEndTime.description: Time index where the individual pretest ends into the sequence

IsTubular.title: Is Tubular
IsTubular.description: Boolean that indicates the measurement is tubular (meaning proceeded inside the installed tubular) - or annular otherwise.

DetailedTestTypeID.title: Detailed Test Type ID
DetailedTestTypeID.description: Identifier of the detailed test run at this station (such as miniDST, miniFrac,…)

DepthReference.title: Depth Reference
DepthReference.description: The vertical measurement reference for this well logging acquisition activity. This object defines the vertical reference datum for the measured depths.

TestReliabilityID.title: Test Reliability ID
TestReliabilityID.description: Identifier of the reference data record indicating the reliability of the tests. This encapsulates the common "TestSuccess" notion - but allows for more flexibility

Curves.title: Curves
Curves.description: Array of unitary Curve (Pressure against Time) description

items.title: Curve
items.description: Describing the characteristics of the "Pressure against Time" recorded curves.

CurveID.title: Curve ID
CurveID.description: The ID of the Well Log Curve

NullValue.title: Null Value
NullValue.description: Indicates that there is no measurement within the curve

CurveUnitID.title: Curve Unit ID
CurveUnitID.description: Unit of Measure for the Log Curve

Mnemonic.title: Mnemonic
Mnemonic.description: The Mnemonic of the Log Curve is the value as received either from Raw Providers or from Internal Processing team

NumberOfColumns.title: Number Of Columns
NumberOfColumns.description: The number of columns present in this Curve for a single reference value. For simple logs this is typically 1; for image logs this holds the number of image traces or property series. Further information about the columns can be obtained via the respective log or curve APIs of the Domain Data Management Service.

CurveSampleTypeID.title: Curve Sample Type ID
CurveSampleTypeID.description: The value type to be expected as curve sample values.

CurveDescription.title: Curve Description
CurveDescription.description: Mnemonic-level curve description is used during parsing or reading and ingesting LAS or DLIS files, to explain the type of measurement being looked at, specifically for that moment. Curve description is specific to that single (log) mnemonic and for the entire log (acquisition run) interval. In essence, curve description defines the internal factors such as what the "curve" or measurement ideally is representing, how is it calculated, what are the assumptions and the "constants".
CurveDescription.example: CBL Adjustment Factor, Resistivity Inversion Selection, Detector 1 Barite Constant
